CustomField.description: Stakeholder: Stakeholders: Sales with Account Management
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the company's legal name for e.g. billing? It is usually in the „about us“/Impressum of websites . If there is an addition such as Gmbh / UG / LDT. / SAS / SL... it’s an operating company. It could however also be a non-incorporated company
CustomField.label: Legal Company Name
